column5: ENPH SPWR RUN a must read article on SunPowers strategy going forward to become much more focused on Energy Services which is built around storage and software and services And they have a new Equinox storage system coming out this fall which will make that possible Enphase also working on a similar solution greentechmediacomarticles and Run is the first company out of the gate with this solution and their BrightBox product Tremendous potential for all 3 companies if this takes off in the next few years They will all become next gen utility companies as well
RUN BO of 1 yr base SMAs trending in right direction IMO as long as holds 1500 this time around then no worries holding long
RUN Mr Gorbachev tear down this wall
